description: Gets the readiness status for an individual readiness check. To see the overall readiness status for a recovery group, that considers the readiness status for all the readiness checks in a recovery group, use GetRecoveryGroupReadinessSummary.

nested_items.name: Messages
nested_items.description: Top level messages for readiness check status.

nested_items.name: MessageText
nested_items.description: The text of a readiness check message.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token that identifies which batch of results you want to see.

nested_items.name: Resources
nested_items.description: Summary of the readiness of resources.

nested_items.name: ComponentId
nested_items.description: The component id of the resource.

nested_items.name: LastCheckedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time (UTC) that the resource was last checked for readiness, in ISO-8601 format.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
